Ich wollte schon lange was zu Dead by Daylight schreiben.

Bei dem Spiel geht es drum das Survivor meist 4 an der Zahl versuchen müssen Generatoren zu reparieren und  fliehen während der Killer einen holen will. 

Während der Killer die Survivor Jagen, Aufhängen oder gar Töten muss .

Ich selber hab beide Seiten ausprobiert und es macht Spaß so wie Survivor zu sein so wie auch Killer.

Please for the love of money, Fix those damn exploit/hacks where a player can boost their speed, apply aimbot on hits, location finder, instant down or instant heal and other myriad of ways to get a competitive advantage. It's been 4 yrs of game play and development. Instead of focusing how to add more contents to milk more money from you base players like different skins/attire/accessory/crap or pieces of flair, focus on auditing your system to root out cheaters.

The Barbecue and chili perk masked the location hack/exploit because they find your location at a near 100% accuracy, The coincidence rate of finding your exact location; hiding in blindspot, closet, corner, window, bushes, far end corner of the map maked is too high be luck or skills. Furthermore, speed exploit added to other hacks make the same perk masked their unfair advantage. 

Your system got hacked recently, putting your core base player to the security risk of monetary  and or identity theft, which points to a lack or disinterest in system security. The main focus of the company is to add-on new costume, skins, accessories or new killers for $15 - $30, rather cyber/system infrastructure security.

This game is fun and can be very high tense because of the scares and chases that occur naturally. I'm not a very good player but I enjoyed the time I had in it as both killer and survivor.  I think its worth 20$ even if you just play as mainly killer or survivor. The things that I found annoying or just bad has really nothing to do with the game but the players honestly. Too many time have I played as a survivor and there's a friendly killer just grinding away at points along side the survivors as well it makes the game not very enjoyable as your guaranteed to escape without a challenge. The other thing is that it takes way too long to get into a game as a survivor at night.  I still recommend this game though because it is fun and very enjoyable when everyone is into it.

DBD is an amazing game, very fun, and very unique. Constants updates with new content keep the game alive and relevant. At this point I question if the devs should make the game free, as it has in game cosmetics, DLCs and even event passes locked behind real money pay wall. Nonetheless the game is still great and worth it's price, supporting the devs is never a bad thing. You should really give it a try if you are interested.
Fun game community loves to rage quit. :)

Balancing is shit and they don't listen to the players, not that they're much help with all their toxic bs, focusing on insulting each other rather than giving alternative solutions. Hit detection is ass, latency is ass, gameplay is the same as the day it hit early access and just gets worse as they add stuff that creates new issues without fixing the old issues. combine that with Killers who just camp and tunnel and this games fun runs dry real quick. Until they can balance shit and punish camping and tunneling in a real manner, Survivors and Killers will always be at odds, and I for one will never feel bad for Killer mains.

*Update*
All the same problems and worse. they found a way to make the matchmaking even more cancerous. Trickster was maid even less fun, only the meta let's you have fun and ONLY if you enjoy being a try hard 24/7. Have fun going against the least fun players in the game every match if you manage to build enough skill before uninstalling this piece of shit.

It is a game that even still today in 2021 i feel holds up very well. The sad fact is that playing as a survivor with no friends on, or just a group to play with can be much longer wait times to find a game, not to mention it finding in your ranks range at the time, but on the flip side can help with the scale of people you face.

For killers in the game the have a much easier time finding a match to host, being they are the host, and with fewer of them over survivors, though in their case it feels like the rank system is a bit higher ended for who you face at moments.

Over all it is a older game that is still worked on, updated with a good set price to buy it at for steam and the DLC (that you never have to pay for if you grind the game). Even still they do their best to optimize the game and graphics to match the time they are in.

I play this game a lot but i can not morally recommend it to anyone. the dev team doesn't consider any feedback from its playerbase. every patch breaks something. maps and characters are constantly being disabled for days to weeks bc this game is held together with the blood tears and failing dreams of bhvr. they screwed up matchmaking and admitted it live on twitch, to the chats absolute horror. if you plan to play this game in any serious capacity (or actually even casually lul) good luck. HOWEVER. if you have friends that play this game? go for it. its a blast when you're screwing around and having fun. but still wishlist and sign up for VHS closed beta!! :)
EDIT 4: adding a lobby theme and cosmetics for an anime created by a japanese nationalist...... and giving one of those cosmetics to a korean character..... is a new low.....  so anyways. play vhs. its free and there's a bunch of pride stuff :)

very good game

This game overall, is worth your time. Now, that's not to say it doesn't have it's imperfections. For example, I recently started actually playing again recently, and I've noticed multiple times that you get hit when the killer whiffs. Another problem, is camping. If you get a killer that decides to fully camp a survivor who's been hooked, unless you fully gen rush, which at lower ranks starting out they probably won't, you're screwed. The killer also has the ability to lunge forward when striking with it's primary attack, but when the killer is already considerably quicker than the survivor, it makes it considerably harder to get away. Especially with the new updated movement animations which made it 1000x harder to dodge the killers strikes. The killers are also each OP in their own way, which makes perfect sense, and with some quirks could make it fully balanced. But overall, if you have friends to play with, it's a fun game to mess around in, ranks don't really matter when playing so don't bother caring too much over them. I like it :).

Ну что, думаю можно написать обзор на данную игру.

 Самая идея интересная и в новинку для меня, первые 20 часов в игре я делал сосо с двойным проглотом, но даже без просмотра гайдов я смог понять как играть, позже стало интересно посмотреть на игру хай рангов и все окончательно понял.

 Интересная система перков, но считаю что пару из них дисбалансные, ну или метовые, не знаю, можно ли их так назвать, но нужно было видеть мое лицо, когда 3 сурва подряд дали по съюбикам с моего мягкого плечика, а потом сами вставали на ноги как гуки из кустов. Но самое страшное, это играть на 16 ранге маньяка против 8-6 рангов сурвов, тут уже был тройной проглот.

 Отдельное внимание заслуживает комьюнити - хорошо играешь? будь готов, что твоя мама будет у кого-то под столом. Плохо играешь? аналогичная ситуация. Но все же, если ты будешь дружелюбен, как я на маньяках, когда чувствую что это free game, я позволяю сурвам пофармить, а последнего и вовсе отпускаю в люк. 

 Игра кайфарик, я бы сказал 10/ 10 кемперов
